S05bsu027_u:3: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ /
S05bsu027_u:4: tatra bhagavānāmantrayate sma - pratītyasamutpādasya vo bhikṣavaḥ ādiṃ vo deśayiṣyāmi vibhaṅgaṃ ca /
S05bsu027_u:5: tacchṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta, bhāṣiṣye -
S05bsu027_u:6: pratītyasamutpādasya ādiḥ katamaḥ? yaduta asmin sati idaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate /
S05bsu027_u:18: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
S05bsu027_u:50: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ katame? trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ - kāyasaṃskārāḥ vāksaṃskārāḥ manaḥsaṃskārā iti //
S05bsu027_u:53: vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti nāma katamat? catvāra arūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ /
S05bsu027_u:54: katame catvāraḥ? vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ vijñānaskandhaḥ /
S05bsu027_u:55: rūpaṃ katamat? yat kiṃcidrūpam, sarvaṃ tat catvāri mahābhūtāni /
S05bsu027_u:56: catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāya itīdaṃ ca nāma, tadaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya nāmarūpamityucyate //
S05bsu027_u:59: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa iti sparśaḥ katamaḥ? ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ /
S05bsu027_u:61: (Psvibh, Vaidya 118) sparśapratyayā vedaneti vedanā katamā? tisro vedanāḥ /
S05bsu027_u:63: vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇeti tṛṣṇā katamā? tisrastṛṣṇāḥ / kāmatṛṣṇā rūpatṛṣṇā arūpyatṛṣṇā ca //
S05bsu027_u:66: upādānapratyayo bhava iti bhavaḥ katamaḥ? trayo bhavāḥ / kāmabhavaḥ rūpabhavaḥ arūpyabhavaḥ //
S05bsu027_u:68_0: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye jātiḥ saṃjātiravakrāntirabhirvṛttiḥ
S05bsu027_u:70_0: yattat khālatyaṃ pālityaṃ valīpracuratā jīrṇatā bhugnatā kubjagopānasīvaṅkatā tilakālakācitagātratā
S05bsu027_u:70_1: khuapraśvāsakāyatā purataḥ prāgbhārakāyatā daṇḍaviṣkambhaṇatā dhandhatvaṃ mandatvaḥ
S05bsu027_u:70_2: hāniḥ parihāṇiḥ indriyāṇāṃ paripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvaḥ jarjarībhāvaḥ / iyamucyate jarā //
S05bsu027_u:72: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmāttasmāt sattvanikāyāt cyutiḥ cyavanato bhedaḥ antarahāṇiḥ āyuṣo hāṇiḥ uṣmaṇo hāṇiḥ jīvitendriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepaḥ maraṇaṃ kālakriyā /
S05bsu027_u:74: idaṃ ca maraṇa pūrvikā ca jarā, tadubhayamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya jarāmaraṇamityucyate //
S05bsu027_u:76: pratītyasamutpādasyādiṃ vo deśayiṣyāmi iti vibhaṅgaṃ ca iti vo yaduktam, tadetat pratyuktam //
